Brix/Fliq

"Come one. We're done here. Let's go."

Brix and Fliq are about to enter the shuttle, when a voice stops them.

"No one is going anywhere."

Brix and Fliq spin around to see a damaged bot, with a small hole in 
his head. Brix and Fliq recognize him at once.

"Gekki....Gekkidama?"

"That's right. The one you left behind, Octociz. When that steel 
thing hit me in the head, I only went into Stasis lock.  You didn't 
even bother to check if I was dead.In about a week I woke up, and I 
was all alone.

"But...we needed to get out. There could have been another explosion, 
and we could've all fried.

"THAT'S NO EXCUSE FOR LEAVING ME STRANDED HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!" Gekkidama 
than looked to Ramulus, "So....you guys have gotten a new friend. 
Well let me give you a warning. Don't get to know these guys. When 
you're hurt, they can abandon you, just like they did to me. It's too 
bad you got hooked up with them. You're innocent. You just wanted a 
little trip to the moon. But now Brix and Octociz have to pay. I've 
been stranded here for months, and now WE'RE ALL GONNA BE STUCK 
HERE!!!"

Gekkidama pulled out his grenade launcher, and fired on at the 
shuttle.

"NO!!!!!!!!!(Using alot of exclamtion points in this post)" Fliq dove 
into the grenade. It his his hand and exploded, causing his entire 
arm to fly off.

"Fliq!" Brix ran over to see Fliq. Mech fluid was pouring out, and he 
had gone into stasis lock.

"Oh...so Octociz has a new name now. Great..."

Brix walked over to Ramulus.

"I hope you can fly. Get Fliq inside the shuttle and heat it up. Fliq 
needs medical attention, or he's gonna die. Give me 5 minutes. If I 
haven't finished this guy yet, take off. Don't look at me like that. 
When Fliq is healed and you've removed the cargo you can come back 
for me. 5 minutes, no more."

Brix turned to Gekkidama

"Show time....."
______________________________________________________________________
Savage

Savage gets weaker as the bots shots continue to make holes in his 
hide. He thinks of a last second plan. He fakes another dive at 
Striker, but turns around and fires 2 fireballs and swings his tail 
repeadidly at the other bot standing on the cliff.
______________________________________________________________________
Zava

Zava looks at the clock. 1:30 before Phobia's ship goes boom. Zava 
laugh to herself.

"All for Deemos.....All for Deemos."
